name: SFSafariWindow
desc: A proxy for a Safari window.

items.name: func getActiveTab(completionHandler: (SFSafariTab?) -> Void)
items.desc: Calls the completion handler with the active tab in the target window.

items.name: func openTab(with: URL, makeActiveIfPossible: Bool, completionHandler: ((SFSafariTab?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Opens a tab at the end of the tab bar.
